Package Entity

Class Table

java.lang.Object
Entity.Table
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Table extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains the information of a particular table.
It includes the table ID, maximum pax, status, customer, order of the table.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Customer
    customer
    The customer that has reversed or occupied this table.
    null if table is not reserved or occupied.
    private int
    maxPax
    Maximum number of people this table can accommodate.
    private boolean
    occupied
    true if table is occupied, false otherwise.
    private Order
    order
    The current order that the customer at this table has placed.
    null if table is not occupied or if customer has not placed order.
    private int
    pax
    The current number of people at the table.
    private boolean
    reserved
    true if table is reserved, false otherwise.
    private LocalDateTime
    reservedTime
    The time the customer has reserved this table for.
    null if table is not reserved.
    private int
    tableId
    The table ID of this table.

      Sets this table as reserved.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer reserving this table.
      pax - the number of pax in the reservation.
      time - the time of the reservation.
